Registry of Open Data on AWS

Xiph.Org Test Media

computer vision image processing imaging machine learning media movies multimedia

Description

Uncompressed video used for video compression and video processing research.

Update Frequency

New videos are added when contributors submit them.

License

Various. Most are under the CC-BY license. License text accompanies each sequence.

Documentation

https://media.xiph.org/aws.html

Contact

Thomas Daede tdaede@xiph.org

Usage Examples

Tutorials
  • Encoding video with AV1 on EC2 by Thomas Daede

Resources on AWS

  • Description
    Video and imagery data
    Resource type
    S3 Bucket
    Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
    arn:aws:s3:::xiph-media
    AWS Region
    us-east-1
    AWS CLI Access (No AWS account required)
    aws s3 ls s3://xiph-media/ --no-sign-request
